document.full_text: saudi king abdullah offered $93 billion in handouts on friday and boosted his security and religious police forces, opting for a mixture of carrot and stick to stave off unrest rocking the arab world.
document.title: saudi king orders more handouts, security boost
lines_and_colors: saudi king abdullah offered $93 billion in handouts on friday and boosted his security and religious police forces, opting for a mixture of carrot and stick to stave off unrest rocking the arab world.
